title: League of Legends
description: Multiplayer online battle arena paling populer di dunia dengan jutaan pemain aktif.

title: Mario Kart 8 Deluxe
description: Game balapan yang penuh aksi dan kejutan, cocok untuk semua umur.

title: The Legend of Zelda: Breath of the Wild
description: Petualangan epik di dunia terbuka dengan grafis yang memukau dan gameplay inovatif.

title: Fortnite
description: Battle royale paling populer dengan berbagai mode permainan dan skin menarik.

title: Call of Duty: Modern Warfare II
description: Game FPS terbaru dari seri Call of Duty dengan visual dan gameplay yang sangat realistis.

title: Minecraft
description: Game sandbox legendaris yang membebaskan kreativitas tanpa batas.

title: GTA V
description: Game open-world dengan cerita yang dalam dan aksi yang intens.

title: Elden Ring
description: Game action RPG dari FromSoftware dengan dunia luas dan tantangan berat.

title: Hollow Knight
description: Game metroidvania dengan seni indah dan tantangan platforming seru.

title: Overwatch 2
description: FPS hero-based dengan karakter unik dan mode kompetitif.

title: Assassin's Creed Shadows
description: The latest installment in the Assassin's Creed series featuring feudal Japan.

title: War Thunder
description: Military vehicle combat MMO featuring aircraft, ground forces, and naval vessels from World War II and the Cold War.

title: Hogwarts Legacy
description: An immersive open-world RPG set in the wizarding world of Harry Potter during the 1800s.

title: Black Myth Wukong
description: An action RPG based on Journey to the West, featuring detailed environments and challenging combat.

title: Tom Clancy's Rainbow Six Siege
description: A tactical first-person shooter that emphasizes environmental destruction and team cooperation.

title: Far Cry 6
description: An action-adventure first-person shooter set in the fictional Caribbean island of Yara.

title: Watch Dogs: Legion
description: An action-adventure game set in a near-future, dystopian London where you can recruit and play as anyone.
